pages.text: Everybody loses things sometimes, but as long as it didn't fall into the void, it can be found. An $(item)Item Seeker$() will allow you to search for items in nearby inventories (5 block range). So simple, yet can save so many headaches

pages.heading: Item Seeker
pages.description: Right click to open search. Can also be used from anywhere in inventory with $(thing)$(k:vaultopic.view)$()

pages.title: Enhanced Item Seeker
pages.text: With a $(item)Luminous Crafting Table$() and some new materials, you can upgrade your $(item)Item Seeker$() to increase its range - doubling it to 10 blocks.

pages.heading: Enhanced Item Seeker
pages.description: Right click to open search. Can also be used from anywhere in inventory with $(thing)$(k:vaultopic.view)$()

pages.title: Regional Crafter
pages.text: With a $(item)Celestial Altar$() and even more new materials, you can upgrade your $(item)Item Seeker$() to enable crafting using items from inventories vithin range. $(br2)It retains the ability to search inventories too, by using the keybind $(thing)$(k:vaultopic.view)$().

pages.heading: Material Index
pages.description: Used in creating and upgrading $(item)Item Seekers$()
